## Purpose

This application is meant to characterize and visualize the musical composition of songs found on Spotify. You can see the makeup of individual songs or analyze them as a group.

## Data

The data was downloaded from Kaggle. The owner used the Spotify API and created a data set for public use. Each song has attributes like danceability, energy, etc., and you can filter by artist and album. For more detailed information, visit the references below.
